lead_paragraph: Brazil's federal police searched the offices of a construction consortium behind one of Rio de Janeiro's main Olympic sites on Tuesday as part of a probe into potential fraud, the police said in a statement.

headline.print_headline: Police Search Construction Firms Behind Olympic Project
headline.main: Police Search Construction Firms Behind Olympic Project
